00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Text;
00026 using System.Xml;
00027 #endregion
00028 
00029 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.RSSHelper
00030 {
00034     public class Document
00035     {
00036         #region Constructors
00037 
00038 
00039 
00040         public Document()
00041         {
00042         }
00043 
00048         public Document(string Location)
00049         {
00050             try
00051             {
00052                 XmlDocument Document = new XmlDocument();
00053                 Document.Load(Location);
00054                 foreach (XmlNode Children in Document.ChildNodes)
00055                 {
00056                     if (Children.Name.Equals("rss", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00057                     {
00058                         foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00059                         {
00060                             if (Child.Name.Equals("channel", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00061                             {
00062                                 Channels.Add(new Channel((XmlElement)Child));
00063                             }
00064                         }
00065                     }
00066                     else if (Children.Name.Equals("rdf:rdf", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00067                     {
00068                         List<Item> Items = new List<Item>();
00069                         foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00070                         {
00071                             if (Child.Name.Equals("channel", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00072                             {
00073                                 Channels.Add(new Channel((XmlElement)Child));
00074                             }
00075                             else if (Child.Name.Equals("item", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00076                             {
00077                                 Items.Add(new Item((XmlElement)Child));
00078                             }
00079                         }
00080                         if (Channels.Count > 0)
00081                         {
00082                             Channels[0].Items = Items;
00083                         }
00084                     }
00085                 }
00086             }
00087             catch { }
00088         }
00089 
00094         public Document(XmlDocument Document)
00095         {
00096             foreach (XmlNode Children in Document.ChildNodes)
00097             {
00098                 if (Children.Name.Equals("rss", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00099                 {
00100                     foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00101                     {
00102                         if (Child.Name.Equals("channel", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00103                         {
00104                             Channels.Add(new Channel((XmlElement)Child));
00105                         }
00106                     }
00107                 }
00108                 else if (Children.Name.Equals("rdf:rdf", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00109                 {
00110                     List<Item> Items = new List<Item>();
00111                     foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00112                     {
00113                         if (Child.Name.Equals("channel", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00114                         {
00115                             Channels.Add(new Channel((XmlElement)Child));
00116                         }
00117                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("item", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00118                         {
00119                             Items.Add(new Item((XmlElement)Child));
00120                         }
00121                     }
00122                     if (Channels.Count > 0)
00123                     {
00124                         Channels[0].Items = Items;
00125                     }
00126                 }
00127             }
00128         }
00129         #endregion

00131         #region Private Variables
00132         private List<Channel> _Channels = null;
00133         #endregion
00134 
00135         #region Properties
00136 
00137 
00138 
00139         public List<Channel> Channels
00140         {
00141             get
00142             {
00143                 if (_Channels == null)
00144                 {
00145                     _Channels = new List<Channel>();
00146                 }
00147                 return _Channels;
00148             }
00149             set { _Channels = value; }
00150         }
00151         #endregion
00152 
00153         #region Public Overridden Functions
00154 
00155 
00156 
00157 
00158         public override string ToString()
00159         {
00160             StringBuilder DocumentString = new StringBuilder("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\r\n<rss xmlns:itunes=\"http://www.itunes.com/dtds/podcast-1.0.dtd\" xmlns:media=\"http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/\" version=\"2.0\">\r\n");
00161             foreach(Channel CurrentChannel in Channels)
00162             {
00163                 DocumentString.Append(CurrentChannel.ToString());
00164             }
00165             DocumentString.Append("</rss>");
00166             return DocumentString.ToString();
00167         }
00168         #endregion
00169 
00170         #region Public Functions
00171 
00172 
00173 
00174 
00175         public void Copy(Document CopyFrom)
00176         {
00177             foreach (Channel CurrentChannel in CopyFrom.Channels)
00178             {
00179                 Channels.Add(CurrentChannel);
00180             }
00181         }
00182         #endregion
00183 
00184     }
